channel.title: Postgres on Ambiguous Implicits - Paul Lysak's blog about programming
channel.description: Recent content in Postgres on Ambiguous Implicits - Paul Lysak's blog about programming

item.title: Error: Multiple ResultSets were returned by the query
item.description: Turned out that error "org.postgresql.util.PSQLException: Multiple ResultSets were returned by the query" may be caused by semicolon (;) in the end of the query when working with Postgres via JDBC
